jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Responsible for completed orders and profit and loss target achievement 
● Accountable for day-to-day operations (motorcycle driver-based service and car driver-based service) such as: -driver acquisition management (outreach, recruitment and onboarding) -driver empowerment management (loyalty & retention and safety & performance training)  -driver exit management and inventory management (driver attributes and driver warrant) 
● Coordinate with and liaise direct and/or matrix superiors for day-to-day escalated issues around driver service and customer service 
● Define, set, and apply strategies from operations perspective during the process of establishing the new area of service 
● Handling channel walk-in center on each region 
● Ensuring problem-solving according to agreed process & based on a standard operational procedure 
● Responsible to manage driver’s problems based on applied regulations 
● Lead, and if necessary, empower and delegate subordinates to co-solve issues 
● Manage all districts and branches operations 
● Manage service time, driver and customer satisfaction

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Having at least 7 years experience in supply chain, preferably at the managerial level
  • Holds a Bachelor’s degree from reputable university
  • Able to handle walk-in channel
  • Expert in face to face service
  • Experienced in a service area (e.g. contact center, email, etc.)
  • Willing to improve driver satisfaction
  • Willing to effectively manage headcount
  • Willing to be relocated
  • Analytical, proactive, and a problem solver
  • Fluent in Bahasa Indonesia & proficient in spoken and written English.
